title: What's Included — SARASWATI AYURVEDA
cleaned_text: Consultation (90 min) Wellness Plan Delivery (60 min) Follow-Up (45 min) Unlimited Voxer + Email Support personal Wellness PLan Your roadmap to vibrant health! Includes: your dosha assessment, Ayurvedic diet and lifestyle recommendations, herbal remedies, recipes and more. access to Client Site You'll get exclusive access to the Saraswati Ayurveda Wellness Space, curated just for clients. This includes helpful resources, articles, recipes, discounts and a private Facebook group.
